name: Serena
description: Semantic code analysis MCP server providing intelligent code understanding, refactoring suggestions, and codebase navigation through language server protocol integration.
longDescription: MCP server by Oraios (runs via uvx from its GitHub repo) that integrates Language Server Protocol for semantic code analysis. Provides go-to-definition, find-references, symbol search, and refactoring suggestions with full type awareness -- significantly more accurate than text-based grep for navigating and understanding codebases.
